entry.title: Russia Plays Down Peace-Talks Progress, Intensifies Attacks in Eastern Ukraine
entry.content: The Kremlin dismissed the idea that Tuesday’s negotiations in Turkey had represented a turning point as Moscow stepped up ground and air attacks in Ukraine’s Donbas region.

entry.title: The U.S. Sanctions a Russian Oligarch---but Exempts His Companies
entry.content: Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said sanctions would “impose massive costs on Putin’s closest confidants.” In reality, the impact is far milder.
